summary: Pipeline constructor (Сценарии анализа) feature fully tested. All 14 backend API tests passed. Frontend React Flow editor verified: list page shows pipelines, clicking opens editor, nodes render with correct types, config panel opens on click with proper fields (ai_prompt shows system_message, prompt, reasoning_effort), add node dropdown works (7/7 node types), save persists changes, navigation works.

pipeline_list_page.verification: List shows seeded 'Стандартный анализ встречи' pipeline with node type badges

pipeline_editor.description: Click pipeline card opens React Flow editor
pipeline_editor.verification: Editor opens with full-height canvas, controls, minimap visible

react_flow_canvas.description: Canvas renders nodes with correct types and connections
react_flow_canvas.verification: 9 nodes displayed with animated edges connecting them

node_config_panel.description: Click node opens config panel on right side
node_config_panel.verification: Panel shows node type icon, label input, delete button

ai_prompt_fields.description: AI prompt node shows system_message, prompt, reasoning_effort
ai_prompt_fields.verification: All 3 fields present: system_message textarea, inline_prompt textarea, reasoning_effort select

add_node_dropdown.description: Add node dropdown adds new nodes to canvas
add_node_dropdown.verification: 7/7 node types available in dropdown, adding nodes works

save_pipeline.description: Save button persists changes via API
save_pipeline.verification: Save shows 'Сценарий сохранён' toast, changes persist after navigation

back_navigation.description: Back button navigates from editor to list
back_navigation.verification: Click back button returns to /pipelines list

dashboard_nav.verification: data-testid='pipelines-nav-btn' visible and clickable on dashboard

create_pipeline.verification: New pipeline created, toast shown, redirected to editor

duplicate_pipeline.verification: Backend API tested successfully, creates copy with '(копия)' suffix

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/pipelines - list all pipelines
Backend: GET /api/pipelines/{id} - get seeded pipeline with 9 nodes, 8 edges
Backend: POST /api/pipelines - create pipeline
Backend: GET after POST - verify persistence
Backend: PUT /api/pipelines/{id} - update pipeline
Backend: GET after PUT - verify update persistence
Backend: POST /api/pipelines/{id}/duplicate - duplicate pipeline
Backend: DELETE /api/pipelines/{id} - delete pipeline
Backend: GET nonexistent - returns 404
Backend: DELETE nonexistent - returns 404
Backend: AI prompt node config (system_message, inline_prompt, reasoning_effort)
Backend: Batch loop node config (batch_size)
Backend: Template node config (template_text)
Backend: All 7 node types supported
Frontend: Login and dashboard navigation
Frontend: Pipelines nav button visible and functional
Frontend: Pipelines list page displays cards
Frontend: Pipeline editor opens with React Flow canvas
Frontend: 9 nodes rendered on canvas for seeded pipeline
Frontend: Node click opens config panel
Frontend: Config panel shows correct fields for ai_prompt node
Frontend: Add node dropdown has 7 node types
Frontend: Add new node to canvas works
Frontend: Save pipeline persists changes
Frontend: Back navigation works
Frontend: Create new pipeline flow works
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
API properly excludes MongoDB _id from responses
React Flow integration works correctly with custom node types
Node config panel conditionally shows fields based on node_type
seed_data_creation: Default pipeline 'Стандартный анализ встречи' was already seeded with 9 nodes and 8 edges
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pipeline feature fully functional. The seeded pipeline now has 10 nodes (one template node was added during testing). All CRUD operations work correctly. React Flow editor properly renders nodes with color-coded types and config panel shows appropriate fields per node type.
